title: Toxic - BoyWithUke - Cifra Club
description: Aprende a tocar el cifrado de Toxic (BoyWithUke) en Cifra Club. I'm better off all by myself / Though I'm feelin' kinda empty without somebody else / Oh, I hear you cryin' out for help / But you never showed for me when I was ringin' your cell phone / Oh, you don't know how it feels to be alone
